[UNIMPLEMENTED UNTIL AFTER 0.3] More...

Public Member Functions

void createObjectStorage (in sbIStateObject aStateObject)
 Create storage for a state object. Create storage for a state object.
void destroyObjectStorage (in sbIStateObject aStateObject)
 Destroy storage for a state object. Delete the storage space and value for a state object.
void save (in sbIStateObject aStateObject, in boolean aCreateStorage)
 Save this state object. Will optionally create storage for your object as well.

Public Attributes

attribute AString datastoreType
 The type of datastore. The type of datastore implemented. As an example,.
attribute boolean canStoreSerializableObjects
 Can this datastore accept serializable objects? If this datastore can accept serializable objects the value of this attribute will be true.
attribute long suggestedMaxSizeForObjects
 Suggested maximum byte size for objects stored. Maximum size of serializable objects this datastore may accept before severe performance impact.
attribute long suggestedMaxObjectCount
 Suggested maximum amount of objects that may be stored. Maximum object count that may be stored in this datastore before severe performance impact.

Detailed Description

[UNIMPLEMENTED UNTIL AFTER 0.3]

This interface may be implemented to provide new datastores for the state service.

See also:
sbIStateObject
Note:
This interface *is* threadsafe. Implementations should follow this assumption.
